definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Hiram (Ph. [[חרם]]; abbr. fr. foregoing)—´[[ח]] 2Sa 5:11 + 18 t. 1 K + Kt 1Ch 14:l, 2Ch 4:11, 2Ch 9:10 (all Qr [[חוּרָם]]); [[חִירוֹם]] 1Ki 5:24, 1Ki 5:32, 1Ki 7:40; also [[חוּרָם]] 1Ch 8:5 + 9t. Ch.—
an artificer of Tyre, sent by Hiram the king 1Ki 7:13, 1Ki 7:40, 1Ki 7:40, 1Ki 7:45, 2Ch 2:12, 2Ch 4:11, 2Ch 4:11, 2Ch 4:16.
